## Quick Installation

### Step 1: Initialize Your Project

If you're already using **shadcn/ui**, skip to Step 2. Otherwise, initialize your project:

<CodeBlock language="bash" code="npx shadcn@latest init" />

You'll be prompted to configure your project. Choose your preferences for styling, components, and directory structure.

### Step 2: Add Elixir UI Components

Once initialized, add any Elixir UI component directly:

<CodeBlock language="bash" code="npx shadcn@latest add https://ui.elixirlabs.in/r/component.json" />

Replace `component` with the specific component name you want to add (e.g., `card`, `header`, `footer`).

<div class="px-6 py-4 border-l-4 border-green-500 bg-green-50 dark:bg-green-950/10 dark:border-green-400 rounded-r-lg mt-6">
  <p class="text-sm text-green-800 dark:text-green-200">
    <strong>That's it!</strong> Your component is now ready to use in your project.
  </p>
</div>

### Need More Help?

ðŸ“˜ [Full shadcn setup guide â†’](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/installation)
